content: चैत्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Relating to a pile. --त्यः {@--1@} The individual soul. {@--2@} A pile of stones forming a land-mark. {@--3@} A monument, tomb-stone. {@--4@} A sacrificial shed. {@--5@} A place of religious worship, altar, sanctuary, {@--6@} A temple. {@--7@} A reflection. {@--8@} A religious fig-tree or any tree growing by the side of streets; <ls>Me. 23.</ls> (रथ्यावृक्ष <ls>Malli.</ls>)
